name: Fruit Ninja 3D
description:
We all loved playing Fruit Ninja 2D well in 3D its better.

Fruit Ninja 3D is a fan game i made for my youtube channel, this is not the final version, i just want to share it to receive some feedback, about wath need to  be improved.

i use unity 3d to develop the game, i really like the idea and the gameplay, hope you like it.

How To Play:

Normal mode :
Right click to enter blade mode.
Move mouse to See around.
(a,d) to rotate the player.
Blade mode : 
Release right click to exite blade mode.
Move mouse left and right to rotate the cut plane.
Move mouse up and down to Move the cut plane up and down.
(a,d) to Move the cut plane left and right.
